DOC.brief_summary: A study validate two newly develop questionnaires Dupuytren 's Disease . The objective develop patient specific outcomes tool Dupuytren 's Disease . While standard validate questionnaire instrument use measure health relate quality life function , address patient specific issue . The investigator also pilot treatment/disease specific satisfaction questionnaire Xiaflex use Dupuytren 's Disease .
DOC.brief_title: Validation Two New Questionnaires Dupuytren 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Subject diagnosis Dupuytren 's Disease least one finger Patients 35 year age old Patients able read , speak , understand English Patients able provide voluntary write consent participate Female patient nurse pregnant , plan become pregnant treatment phase . Patient chronic muscular , neurological neuromuscular disorder affect hand . Patient know allergy collagenase excipient XIAFLEX . Patient receive collagenase treatment first dose XIAFLEX . Any history current medical condition investigator 's opinion would make subject unsuitable enrollment study
